review_data.title: Good value for the price
review_data.content: Good Asian restaurant, with prices that are reasonable for Zürich. The menu includes non-Chinese dishes so you can also have a calorie-conscious diet. The service was friendly and professional.

review_data.title: excellent curries

review_data.title: Asian lunch
